summary: MY 1998 OLDS MINIVAN STARTED TO OVER HEAT WHILE MY WIFE WAS TRANSPORTING OUR CHILDREN AND FOSTER CHILDREN. WHEN THIS HAPPENS SHE MUST PULL OVER TO LET THE ENGINE COOL CREATING A SAFETY HAZARD. THE OLDSMOBILE DEALER SAYS THE INTAKE GASKET IS LEAKING COOLANT AND THE REPAIR COST IS OVER $600. I HAVE LEARNED THIS IS MANUFACTURING DEFECT THAT GM HAS HAD MANY COMPLAINTS ON.       *JB
